casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brad Cayton NORWOOD 21P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 19, 2018 Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Appellate Defender, for Norwood, Brad Cayton. Matthew Liles, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of January 2018."
